answers.answer: Sure, if we were doctors. This is a diabetes forum, so your question isn't even on the topic we might know something about! Your doctor should have made you an appointment to discuss these findings.

question: when having the ultra sound the dx found "dilated common bile duct and pancreatic duct. may be the possibility of pathology in the region of the pancreatic head. also focal echogenic hepatic mass, possible hemangioma...can u tell me what these findings mean
title: ultra sound for liver cysts
